title: ICE: "unwrap called on None" during futures 0.1 -> 0.3 migration

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: S-waiting-on-author
labels.description: Status: This is awaiting some action (such as code changes or more information) from the author.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I tried this code: ```rust ``` ```sh git clone https://github.com/paritytech/sccache sccache-demo2 cd sccache-demo2 git checkout bernhard-rustc-none-unwrap cargo b ``` I expected to see this happen: `rustc` completing with errors Instead, this happened: `unwrap` on a `None` value ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.46.0 (04488afe3 2020-08-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: 04488afe34512aa4c33566eb16d8c912a3ae04f9 commit-date: 2020-08-24 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.46.0 LLVM version: 10.0 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', /rustc/04488afe34512aa4c33566eb16d8c912a3ae04f9/src/librustc_hir/definitions.rs:316:35 stack backtrace: 0: backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:86 1: backtrace::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized at /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/backtrace-0.3.46/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66 2: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:78 3: ::fmt at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59 4: core::fmt::write at src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1076 5: std::io::Write::write_fmt at src/libstd/io/mod.rs:1537 6: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:62 7: std::sys_common::backtrace::print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:49 8: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} at src/libstd/panicking.rs:198 9: std::panicking::default_hook at src/libstd/panicking.rs:217 10: rustc_driver::report_ice 11: as core::ops::function::Fn>::call at /home/bernhard/.rustup/toolchains/1.46.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src/liballoc/boxed.rs:1095 12: proc_macro::bridge::client::::enter::{{closure}}::{{closure}} at /home/bernhard/.rustup/toolchains/1.46.0-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/src/libproc_macro/bridge/client.rs:318 13: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook at src/libstd/panicking.rs:530 14: rust_begin_unwind at src/libstd/panicking.rs:437 15: core::panicking::panic_fmt at src/libcore/panicking.rs:85 16: core::panicking::panic at src/libcore/panicking.rs:50 17: rustc_middle::hir::map::Map::def_kind 18: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 19: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 20: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 21: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 22: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 23: rustc_middle::ty::util::::closure_base_def_id 24: rustc_typeck::collect::generics_of 25: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::generics_of>::compute 26: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 27: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 28: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 29: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 30: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_query_impl 31: rustc_typeck::collect::collect_mod_item_types 41: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::collect_mod_item_types>::compute 42: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 43: error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.46.0 (04488afe3 2020-08-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [def_kind] looking up definition kind of `compiler::compiler::CompilerHasher::get_cached_or_compile::{{closure}}#0` #1 [generics_of] computing generics of `compiler::compiler::CompilerHasher::get_cached_or_compile::{{closure}}#0::{{closure}}#0` #2 [collect_mod_item_types] collecting item types in module `compiler::compiler` #3 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: aborting due to 12 previous errors; 20 warnings emitted Some errors have detailed explanations: E0423, E0425, E0706, E0728. For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0423`. error: could not compile `sccache`. To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. ```
